optionsUseDblClick: Double click on a word to show popup
optionsShowDictIcons: Show icons of additional online dictionaries
optionsTrademark: LinguaLeo® — registered trademark of LinguaLeo LTD.
optionsAbout1: LinguaLeo — the best place in the world to learn English language online!
optionsAbout2:
There is a huge library of fascinating media:
podcasts, episodes, lectures and dialogs in authentic English.
optionsAbout3: Learn language in context, increase your vocabulary, pass trainings, complete quests with your personal Leo-pet, and monitor your real-time progress with pleasure!
changelogSupport: If you found a bug in the extension or just have any comments — do not hesitate to contact us: extensions@lingualeo.ru.
changelogHowToUse:
Woohoou! The LinguaLeo extension $1 has been installed!
How to use?
changelogUseOptions1:
Very easy.

You can translate words and phrases from English on the page you are reading. You will see a translation right near the text!
changelogUseOptions2_all:
To translate a word:
double-click it or select it, then right-click it and choose "Add to dictionary"

To translate an idiom (i.e. several words):
select all the words, right-click on them, choose "Add to dictionary".
changelogUseOptions2_opera:
To translate a word:
double-click it or hold Ctrl button and select the word.

To translate an idiom (i.e. several words):
hold Ctrl button and select the words.
changelogUseOptions3:
Once you add one translation of a word or phrase, you can memorize it at www.lingualeo.com using one of our many exercises.
Select one of the best translations in our dictionary - or enter a better one!

To learn your words and phrases, go to www.lingualeo.com and train them!
changelogInfo: If you've just installed the extension and it doesn't work on currently opened pages — reload them (F5 key). Or just restart the browser.
changelogSeeOptions: See options to configure the extension for your needs.
loginDialogCapt: Sign in to learn new words and phrases.
loginDialogEmailIncorrect: The email or password are incorrect. Try again.
meatballsDialogHeader2: You need meatballs to add new words — one per each word.
